name: The fang of Kriesha (1h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does cold damage like a god.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
It carries godly essence inside it.
